aboutMe.basicInfo:
Hello! My name is Sergei, I am {old} years old and I really like programming.
I have an experience in developing of CRM systems, testing systems, sites for sales and landing pages.

You can find some basic information about me on this site with some test examples. If we are dealing with you and you want me to write some test tasks, it will be located here.

Navigation is placed in the menu at the top right.

Regards, Sergei.
